title: Accurate Timer API tuned for precision
body: Windows Phone has for some time some unfortunate issues with any timer based apps, where the background events do not fire in an accurate and precise point in time.

comments.body: This is basic functionality that should have been baked into Windows Phone at launch. I empathise with the stopclock app developers who have had to put up with this mess for so long. I really hope this gets looked at.
